decisions.name: Documents_received

decisions.name: HTAR_Documents_received_not_yet_reviewed
decisions.label: HTAR Documents received, not yet reviewed

formulas.name: riskProfile
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.IdentityCheckStatus__c},"") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.IdentityCheckStatus__c}, "Pending documentation") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.WC1__c}, "Pending review") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.WC1__c},"") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.HtarApprovalStatus__c},"Documents required") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.HtarApprovalStatus__c},"Documents requested") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.HtarApprovalStatus__c},"Documents received") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.PepStatus__c},""), "", IF( {!htarRank} = "2" || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.PepStatus__c}, "Currently a PEP") || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.WC1__c}, "Fail") || NOT(ISNULL({!$Record.Flags__c})), "High", IF( {!htarRank} = "1" || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.WC1__c}, "MLRO approval required"), "Elevated", "Standard" ) ) )
